titlestmt.titleproper: Cholmondeley-Pennell, H. (Henry), 1837-1915. Papers on fishing (MS Eng 1591): Guide.

titlepage.titleproper: Cholmondeley-Pennell, H. (Henry), 1837-1915. Papers on fishing: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2006 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University

note.p: This collection is shelved offsite at the Harvard Depository. See access restrictions below for additional information.

did.unittitle: Papers on fishing,
did.abstract: Correspondence with publishers, fishing tackle manufacturers, and others, concerning writings on fishing by British naturalist and editor, Henry Cholmondeley-Pennell. Also includes drafts of autograph manuscripts, and clippings and autograph notes on fishing, and samples of fishing line and flies.

acqinfo.p: Purchased with the Minot Fund; received: 1918 Nov. 14. Recataloged from F 5.14.25*

accessrestrict.p: This collection is not housed at the Houghton Library but is shelved offsite at the Harvard Depository. Retrieval requires advance notice. Readers should check with Houghton Public Services staff to determine what material is offsite and retrieval policies and times.

bioghist.p: Cholmondeley-Pennell (1837-1915) was a British naturalist and editor who published poetry and many volumes on coarse-fly and deep-sea fishing. Two of his most well-know books were: Badminton library of sports and pastimes: Fishing. With contributions from other authors and The modern practical angler : a complete guide to fly-fishing, bottom-fishing trolling.

arrangement.p:
Organized into two series:
I. Correspondence with H. (Henry) Cholmondeley-Pennell
II. Other materials

scopecontent.p: Early letters concern his various writings on fishing. Correspondence circa 1902-1905 concerns the revision for a new edition of a volume in the Badminton Library of Fishing. With contributions from other authors: Pike and other coarse fish. Includes letters to and from printers, publishers, writers of articles within this volume, fishing experts, fishing equipment suppliers, and fishing enthusiasts. Also includes samples of fishing line and fishing flies.

relatedmaterial.p: The library has several works by this author containing his autograph notes in preparation for later editions, with autograph letters by him, inserted. See: F 214.5.25*, F 214.5.30*, F 214.5.31*, F 214.5.36*, F 214.5.37*, F 1635.14.72*, and F 1650.13.36*.

II. Other materials

note.p: Partial manuscripts with autograph manuscript revisions and annotations. Includes titles: The 2-hook worm tackle for salmon and its inception, Addendum A., For chapter on live bating, and Page 138.
